title: janara naDade
sahitya:
jangamaru nAvu jagadoLu


anupallavi

  jangamaru nAvu lingAngigaLu mangaLavantaru bhavigaLentembiri


caraNam 1    hara guru daiva kEshava namma manadaiva varada mOhana gurushAndEsha 
hara guru drOha mADida paravAdiyu raurava narakadi muLuguvude siddha
    caraNam 2    vibhUti namaguNTu vishvEsha namaguNTu shObhana nAma mudregaLuNTu 
shrI bhAgIratiya gaNita majjanavuNTu saubhAgyavIva mahantana madhadavaru
    caraNam 3    viraktaru nAvu shIlavantaru nAvu vIrabhadra priya bhaktaru nAvu
kAraNa karta shrI purandara viTTalana kAruNyake mukhya pAtravu nAvu
